page.title: 16Farming
page.content: This area is fertile farming land and the present farmers carry on this work. Farming methods have changed and today's farms only employ a small number of farm workers. The main land use in this area is farming and the main type of farming is arable. One of the local farmers,who farms land to the north of the River Swale, explained that the larger farms tend to produce more cereals,and the smaller farms tend to have dairy cattle. Many of the larger farms have been owned and farmed by the same families for generations.
